Capability of working in a high-pressure environment.

description: Responsibility for develop Cloud Backend API & Dashboard.

This Cloud server provides a RESTful API for controlling configuration settings, storage, hardware, model, get logs, and other aspects of devices/tablets used in department stores. With the primary goal of collecting/analyzing AI data on all customers and preventing any thefts.
Support for uploading/downloading the record video from a device to an Azure storage through Cloud server.
Generate and receive an RTMP endpoint URL for usage in a device for live streaming.
The Dashboard Server page may also be used to manage and set device parameters in real time.
Responsibility for develop Back-end, API.
This web app provides functions to support manage talents, stars, live stream, channel youtube and some actions/activities as a social network.
Responsibility for develop Back-end, API.
This mobile app provides functions to support manage sport team, members, storage, sharing post and some actions/activities as a social network.
Providing scoreboard to update point realtime.
System for tracking gps of vehicles.
Receive packages from ~40K devices for 10s.
Track vehicles journey and show up on a self-build map (openstreetmap).
Build batch job for generating missing gps & reverse geocoding from gps coordinates to address.

development_env: Express framework, Openstreetmap, Open Source Routing Machine (OSRM)
